lines.english: Éist liom, ná tar chugam le do chuid smaointí
lines.irish: Listen to me, don’t come at me with your thoughts

lines.english: Ná déan anailís ar mo chuid líntí
lines.irish: Don’t analyse my lyrics

lines.english: My child loves HOOD so I wish you would do a version for him, but PG
lines.irish: Is breá le mo pháiste HOOD, mar sin ba mhaith liom leagan PG dó

lines.english: Send me it when you can, he’s your number one fan
lines.irish: Seol chugam é nuair is féidir leat, is é do lucht leanúna is mó é

lines.english: His first word’s were Cultúrlann so he understands all of 3CAG and
lines.irish: Ba é 'Cultúrlann' a chéad fhocal mar sin tuigeann sé 3CAG go hiomlán

lines.english: He only started Naíscoil an mhí seo, he just thinks you guys are lethal
lines.irish: Thosaigh sé sa Naíscoil an mhí seo, ceapann sé go bhfuil sibh dochreidte

lines.english: I know he’s a wee bit young, try to keep it from him, déanaimse mo dhícheall
lines.irish: Tá a fhios agam go bhfuil sé óg go fóill, déanaim mo dhícheall é a choimeád uaidh

lines.english: Comhghairdeas your my new ghost writer, 40 odd, breath smells like cider
lines.irish: Comhghairdeas, is tusa mo scríbhneoir taibhse nua, daichead is rud éigin, boladh leann úll ó do anáil

lines.english: Trying to talk business to me with jizz on your teeth, back of the glider!
lines.irish: Ag iarraidh gnó a phlé liom le seamhan ar do chuid fiacla, ag cúl an ghleidire!

lines.english: KNEECAP, is breá liom sibh, nach bhfuil aon seans go dtiocfadh libh
lines.irish: KNEECAP, I love ye, but there’s no chance you’ll succeed

lines.english: Stick a wee tune out just for the kids cos my two ones they love you to bits
lines.irish: Scaoil amhrán beag amach don pháistí mar is breá le mo bheirt sibh

lines.english: Oh fuck sake, wise up miss, we’re degenerate HOODs who like to get pissed
lines.irish: Ah, le do thoil, ciall a bhaint amach, is HOODanna craiceáilte muid a thaitníonn le bheith ar meisce

lines.english: And we spunk every penny getting off of our tits, this isn’t no act, it’s just the way it is, real shit
lines.irish: Caithimid gach pingin le bheith as ár meabhair, níl sé seo mar aisteoireacht, is é seo an fíorshaol

lines.english: You’ll find me in a snug of a dimly lit shit run down pub
lines.irish: Gheobhaidh tú mé i gcúinne beag de phub dorcha scriosta

lines.english: Face all smug in a place I love, seeing how fucked I can get on government funds
lines.irish: Aghaidh sásta i mo áit ghrámhar, ag féachaint cé chomh hólta is féidir liom a fháil ar chistí stáit

lines.english: That’s another pint done, ordaigh deoch sula labhrann cunt liom
lines.irish: Sin pionta eile críochnaithe, ordaigh deoch sula n-labhraíonn aon amadán liom

lines.english: And up walks some random standing over me rapping one of my songs
lines.irish: Agus tagann duine aisteach suas, ag rapáil ceann de mo chuid amhrán os mo chionn

lines.english: Maith an fear, seo here, is breá liom do cheol, nach dtiocfadh leat díriú isteach ar an ól
lines.irish: Maith thú, seo anseo, is breá liom do cheol, nach féidir leat díriú ar an ól amháin

lines.english: An chaint seo ar fad ar na drugaí are bad, is tá mé a rá leat ní mharfaidh tú i bhfad
lines.irish: An chaint seo ar fad faoi conas atá drugaí olc, ach táim á rá leat nach mairfidh tú i bhfad

lines.english: Aw here go raibh maith agat do do chomhairle críonna
lines.irish: Ah, go raibh maith agat as do chomhairle stuama

lines.english: Cá raibh tusa nuair a thosaigh muid na blianta ó shin
lines.irish: Cá raibh tú nuair a thosaíomar blianta ó shin?

lines.english: No fuck, get a right to the chin and now you’re crying on twitter and that’s a win win
lines.irish: Ní hea, buille ceart ar do smig agus anois tá tú ag caoineadh ar Twitter – bua dúbailte

lines.english: [Male Reporter] On the Nolan show today a mural of a burning police car and chants of get the brits out
lines.irish: [Tuairisceoir Fir] Ar an gclár Nolan inniu, murla d’fheithicil póilíní trí thine agus béic ‘amach leis na Sasanaigh’

lines.english: This is Ireland 2022 rappers Kneecap say the mural was unveiled as just a piece of FINE ART
lines.irish: Seo Éire 2022 – deir na rapálaithe Kneecap gur cuireadh an murlán i láthair mar phíosa de EALAÍN FÍNEÁLTA

lines.english: C-E-A-R-T-A, you say it needs more Tiocfaidh ár Lá’s
lines.irish: C-E-A-R-T-A, deir tú go dteastaíonn níos mó ‘Tiocfaidh ár Lá’ uaidh

lines.english: Ag dul ar aghaidh faoi go bhfuil easpa collabs ag Kneecap, fuckin cuirigí ceol amach!
lines.irish: Ag gearán nach bhfuil collabs ag Kneecap, ansin cuirigí ceol amach sibh féin!

lines.english: So you’re wondering why we take ages to release music? We’re always on stages
lines.irish: An bhfuil tú ag ceistiú cén fáth a dtógann sé tamall orainn ceol a scaoileadh? Táimid i gcónaí ar ardáin

lines.english: All over in different places, rockin balaclavas on our faces
lines.irish: Ar fud na háiteanna éagsúla, ag caitheamh balaclava ar ár n-aghaidheanna

lines.english: You can love us or hate us, won’t affect a bit of our wages
lines.irish: Is féidir leat grá nó fuath a bheith agat dúinn, ní dhéanfaidh sé difear dár tuarastal

lines.english: More merch, more drugs, less cops, more thugs, more scum, listen out on cases
lines.irish: Tuilleadh marsantas, níos mó drugaí, níos lú gardaí, níos mó amadan, níos mó scum, éist le cásanna

lines.english: You can love us or hate us, won’t affect a bit of our wages
lines.irish: Is féidir leat grá nó fuath a bheith agat dúinn, ní dhéanfaidh sé difear dár tuarastal

lines.english: More merch, more drugs, less cops, more thugs, more scum, more FINE ART
lines.irish: Tuilleadh marsantas, níos mó drugaí, níos lú gardaí, níos mó amadan, níos mó scum, níos mó EALAÍN FÍNEÁLTA
